title: The News parade: Tarawa
brief_description: Incorporates newsreel footage of World War II in three segments: footage of the fate of Japan being resolved by the United States, China and Great Britain; footage of Stalin, Churchill and Roosevelt; and footage depicting the capture of the Japanese at Tarawa by the United States Marines.
